mapper.select: SELECT t.inn_id,cf.name as from_name , m.customer_from_id as from_id,COUNT(DISTINCT m.id) as order_num ,SUM(t.days) as live_num,SUM(m.commission) as commission ,SUM(t.room_price) as income FROM ( SELECT o.inn_id, EXTRACT(DAY FROM(o.check_out_at - o.check_in_at)) as days ,o.main_id,o.room_id,o.room_price FROM tomato_inn_sub_order o LEFT JOIN tomato_inn tin ON tin.id = o.inn_id ) t INNER JOIN tomato_inn_main_order m ON m.id = t.main_id INNER JOIN tomato_inn_room r ON r.id = t.room_id LEFT JOIN tomato_inn_customer_from cf ON cf.id = m.customer_from_id WHERE 1=1 AND m.order_status >1 AND m.check_out_at BETWEEN '${from}' AND '${to}' GROUP BY m.customer_from_id,t.inn_id,cf.name
